description:
Resistant to chlorine, this suit stands up to regular, weekly training. The Super Pro Back Suit is excellent for swimmers who are in the pool multiple times a week.

  • Made of a PBT and polyester knit. PBT is a thermoplastic that has natural stretch similar to LYCRA and is very resistant to damage from salt water or chlorine
  • Racer back provides maximum support
  • Endurance+ fabric holds their colour and shape more than 20x longer than conventional swimwear fabrics with regular chlorine exposure
  • Comfortable front lining
name: Speedo Endurance+ Solid Super Pro - Women's
